content: Let's get down to business, to defeat the Huns. Did they send me daughters when I asked for sons? You're the saddest bunch I ever met. But you can bet, before we're through Mister, I'll make a man out of you. Tranquil as a forest, but on fire within. Once you find your center, you are sure to win. You're a spineless, pale, pathetic lot and you haven't got a clue. Somehow, I'll make a man out of you.
author: Barry Cook, Tony Bancroft
